title: Inquire About Lost Item at Attraction
description: A visitor calls a theme park's guest services to report a lost camera.

tasks.description: Gather details from the visitor: description of the camera, where and when it was likely lost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information to search for the item.

tasks.description: Search the park's lost and found database for a matching item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the database but finds no matching camera at this time.

tasks.description: Create a lost item report with the visitor's contact information and advise them that they will be contacted if it is found.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files a report and provides the visitor with a reference number.
